1271930.name: Zango's Shark Adventure
1271930.description:
Zango's Shark Adventure - is an action & adventure platformer game - which relates to a story of a Monkey named Zango - who goes out against all odds to save his family. The game has 4 Chapters with 32 unique levels with tons of adventure and fun!!

Game Features:


1. Unique Gameplay like no other!!
2. 4 Chapters with 32 unique levels including Boss levels, chasing, survival and platformer!!
3. Lot of Zango's ability to help him complete the levels: Swimming, Auto Target Enemies/Items, Double Jump, Climb, Slow Effect, Freezing a platform, Dash across Portals and much more!!
4. Play along with Zango's Sidekick - Thunder the Parrot - to help him move to checkpoints!!
5. With Keyboard or Joystick Support. Also includes support for customizing Joystick Buttons.

Version 1.0.6 out now:


Fixes:
1. Fixed a Parrot bug on Tutorial level on Insane mode
2. Fixed a scoring bug at Boss level

Changes:
1. Changed a stone graphic on Tutorial level
2. Added a hint at tutorial level
